sentences.sContent: In that region, Chile went from ninth to first, overall, as Chilean mobile web use increased by 3200% over the past year.
sentences.sCn: 智利从这一地区的第九跃升到第一位，因为智利的移动网络用户在过去一年增长了 3200% 。

sentences.sContent: In the 1904 marathon, an athlete time when he was chased of course by two dogs. He came back again and managed to finish ninth only.
sentences.sCn: 1904年的马拉松比赛，计时开始，一名运动员却正被两只狗追赶，他再次回到比赛中，也只是努力完成了九分之一的赛程。

words.tran: 第九十的；九十分之一的

trans.tranOther: coming after eight other things in a series
